sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input type="text" v-model="text" @input="updateInput" :value="modelvalue">
</template>

<script>
export default {
 name: 'MainInput',

 data:() => ({

 }),

 methods: {
  updateInput(event) {
   this.$emit('update:modelvalue', event.target.value)
  }
 },

}
</script>

<style>

</style>
